head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LUNG, MARY LEE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LUNG, MARY LEE

block.p: LUNG-Mary Lee. Born in Philadelphia May 16, 1927. Passed away peacefully on July 21, 2000. Survived by sons Peter and John; daughter-in-law Laura and grandchildren David, Benjamin and Emily, friend Mark Bernard Cohn, brothers Albert and Thomas Lee, and sister Helen Lee. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be sent to Metropolitan Duane United Methodist Church, 201 W. 13th Street, NY, NY 10011.
